did.unittitle: Miscellany
Miscellany
Charcoal sketch of Lowell Thomas by McClelland Barclay; verso: "To Mr. Barclay who played on LT's '9 Olden Men' team. L.T. should have been a mining engineer"; lithograph print
Verso: To Mr Barclay who played on LT's "9 Old Men" team L.T. should have been a mining engineer.

Charcoal sketch of Lowell Thomas by McClelland Barclay; inscription: "to my old John T. Reynolds, a stout heated chap who is bound to make a go of anything he tackles. From his admirer, Lowell Thomas"; lithograph print

Page 121 - The water was now knee deep
